metadata.title: Seek Optics Compatible/Replacement Lenses for Spy Optics Helm Sunglasses Polarized UV400
description: Broken the lenses of your Spy Optics Helm sunglasses? Don't want to spend your money on buying a new one? You can save your hard-earned dollars just by replacing the lenses. SeekOptics Replacement Lenses are guaranteed to fit your Spy Optics Helm sunglasses. They are Durable, Impact-Resistant, provide 100% UV Protection and offer Optimal HD Clarity while also Reducing Glare.
Durable: Heavy-duty, Scratch-Resistant and Impact-Resistant lenses
Durable: Heavy-duty, Scratch-Resistant and Impact-Resistant lenses
Safety: UV400, Anti-Glare and Improves Clarity
Safety: UV400, Anti-Glare and Improves Clarity
Versatile: can be used while driving, baseball, tennis, football or soccer!
Versatile: can be used while driving, baseball, tennis, football or soccer!
Repel coating against water, oil, fog, and dust
Repel coating against water, oil, fog, and dust
Lens Care: Please avoid salt water, sea water, pool water and soapy water. Do not use chlorine or alcohol-based cleaners. Take care to clean with clear water and a soft microfiber cloth.
Lens Care: Please avoid salt water, sea water, pool water and soapy water. Do not use chlorine or alcohol-based cleaners. Take care to clean with clear water and a soft microfiber cloth.
